bedcraftbeyond.frames.messages.reset_ent: Reset whitelist for entry %s under type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.messages.frame_val: Block %s (meta %s) is a valid frame type for %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.messages.frame_inv: Block %s (meta %s) is NOT a valid frame type for %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.parsing.no_: Could not parse frame type for entry %s: entry 'type' field not found.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.parsing.inv: Could not parse frame type for entry %s. Frame type '%s' is invalid.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.invalid: Invalid registry (%s): Block does not exist or is not registered.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.already_add: Entry %s is already added to the whitelist for type %s.
Entry %s already has meta %s added to its whitelist for type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.not_valid_e: Invalid frame entry: %s is not in the valid frame list.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.errors.invalid_fra: Frame is invalid. Please destroy and recraft.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.blacklisted: Successfully whitelisted %s (and its variants) to frame type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.blacklisted.fail: Failed to whitelist %s (and its variants) to frame type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.blacklisted.by_met: Failed to blacklist %s (meta %s) to %s frame type.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.whitelisted: Successfully whitelisted %s (and its variants) to frame type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.whitelisted.fail: Failed to whitelist %s (and its variants) to frame type %s.
bedcraftbeyond.frames.whitelisted.by_met: Failed to whitelist %s (meta %s) to frame type %s.
